channel.title: Posts on Anthony Comtois' Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Anthony Comtois' Blog

item.title: Introduction
item.description: Hello, I’m Anthony Comtois and I have been working in IT for over 10 years. I have seen various entreprise types: large, medium, small startup. I like being delivery focus and thinking about the full picture of a project to improve it and going forward. I’m working on a few blog posts, you can subscribe to the RSS feed to get notified. I will share my knowledge which can hopefully help others.
